text: we used to eat a lot I mean every day we
would go out to eat a lot we go to some
of the nicest restaurants we would take
walks take my daughter to the park as a
family we will go to the movies we would
go shopping you know that go to the
grocery store the little things to us is
what matter
we were both hard-working people you
know we lived in poverty we we wasn't
born with things so we worked very very
hard to get the things that we have and
we tried to we are vowed to each other
was to have love to have understanding
have communication and to be as one and
as he lays his body to rest and as he's
up in heaven all of those things that
weave out together as a partner those
are the things that I vowed to not let
go and to remain keeping those things
alive because he he deserves that he
made sure that I was happy he made sure
that I was smiling he made sure that
myself and my daughter didn't want or
need for anything and with that alone
says that man was amazing she's amazing
please don't tell me my boyfriend just
went like that walking keep walking keep
walking get on your knees get on your
knees we were planning marriage we're
gonna get a dog we're gonna have kids
we're gonna have a great family we're
gonna move when I was gonna get a better

here in America the hood we're gonna get

without them it's very hard to move
forward I am gonna stay strong
absolutely
